title: Salvation
description: They responded to the zombie outbreak, they made their escape, but now what? Simply living the life of being on the run just won't cut it for Joe and his ever-increasing band of survivors. Their saving grace may not have been found yet, but they must keep seeking their salvation. In the third book of the Six Feet From Hell series, Joe and his group try and find a stable life even though it might not be what they wanted. They have to come to terms with the fact that the help they want may or may not be the help they get...
author: Joseph Coley
